Package hr.fer.zemris.java.hw13.servlets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GlasanjeGlasajServlet
    Servlet used to register a vote cast for a band in the voting application.
    GlasanjeGrafikaServlet
    Servlet used to create a Pie Chart based on the current vote state.
    GlasanjeRezultatiServlet
    Servlet used to prepare the info about vote state for the jsp.
    GlasanjeServlet
    Servlet used to prepare the info about the bands available for voting.
    GlasanjeXLSServlet
    Servlet used to create a Microsoft excel file with voting results.
    PieChartServlet
    Servlet used to create a demonstration Pie Chart for Java 13th homework.
    PowersServlet
    Servlet used to read the given parameters and create a Microsoft excel file based on those parameters.
    SetColorServlet
    Servlet used to enable the user to choose the background color of the pages he visits.
    SquaresServlet
    Servlet used to create a table with 2 columns.
    SquaresServlet.Pair
    Static class used to represent a pair of numbers, the original number and it's square value.
